title: Riccardo Favretto
text:
Riccardo Favretto (<a href="Treviso">Treviso</a>, 18 October 2001) is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
His usual position is as a <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">Lock</a> and he currently plays for <a href="Benetton%20Rugby">Benetton</a> in <a href="Pro14">Pro14</a>.
For the last matches of <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20Pro14">2019–20 Pro14</a> season and for <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20Pro14">2020–21 Pro14</a> season, he was named as "Permit Player" for <a href="Benetton%20Rugby">Benetton</a>.
In 2020, Favretto was named in the <a href="Italy%20national%20under-20%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy Under 20</a> squad.
From March 2021 he is also part of <a href="Italy%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy</a> squad. On the 14 October 2021, he was selected by <a href="Alessandro%20Troncon">Alessandro Troncon</a> to be part of an <a href="Italy%20A%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy A</a> 28-man squad for the <a href="2021%20end-of-year%20rugby%20union%20internationals">2021 end-of-year rugby union internationals</a>.
